metadata.title: CVE-2017-15403 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in crosh could lead to a command injectionunder chronos privileges in Networking in Google Chrome on Chrome OS priorto 61.0.3163.113 allowed a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
